about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: I'm Nicolás Martín Catania, a 22-year-old passionate about technology. I aspire to establish myself in the backend industry and kickstart my professional career. Although I haven't yet had the opportunity to work in the industry, I am eager and enthusiastic about landing my first internship or job. Beyond my enthusiasm for tech, I enjoy playing the guitar, going to the gym, learning new languages and continuously learning and improving.

contactInfo.title: Contact Me
contactInfo.copy: @2025 Nicolas Martin Catania. All rights reserved.

project1.name: MySongSet
project1.desc: Web application for organizing songs that I play on the guitar in playlists, using Spotify API integration and a minimalistic UI design, it helped me to not forget about the songs that I know, because I always end up playing the same 10 over and over.

project2.name: Basic products API
project2.desc: API featuring CRUD of different entities such as products and users, user roles, Spring Security, and JWT auth. Includes a basic frontend.

project3.name: Battle simulation in Java
project3.desc: Final project developed in a group for an advanced programming subject. Console application built in Java using many design patterns, with a small connection to Prolog.

uni.title: Software Engineer student
uni.description: With 50% of the career completed and GPA of 8 out of 10, this career gives me a strong background in computer science, data structures, and algorithms with C, OOP with Java, as well as systems analysis, systems design and basic networking and cryptography knowledge.

ap.title: Fullstack software developer
ap.institution: "Argentina Programa", provided by the National Ministry of Economy
ap.description: First stage completed where we learned OOP with Ruby and JS. On the other hand, I was not able to complete the second stage due to personal issues, which covered Angular, Java, and Spring Boot programming to create RESTful APIs and web applications, although I learned a lot of valuable knowledge.
